pkgmetadata.longdescription: DSM and LiDAR downloader // A collection of functions to search and donwload DSM (Digital Surface Model) and LiDAR (Light Detection and Ranging) data via APIs, including 'OpenTopography' https://portal.opentopography.org/apidocs/ and 'TNMAccess' https://apps.nationalmap.gov/tnmaccess/#/.
